```{r}
source("functions.R")
loadPackages()
```


```{r}
userData<-read_csv("../data/anonymizedData.csv")
```

```{r}
totalUsers<-nrow(userData)

```


***3. Do you live on campus?***

```{r}

userData %>%
  group_by(onCampus) %>%
  summarize(count=n(), percent=round(count/totalUsers*100, 1)) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))%>%
  rename("On Campus"=onCampus) %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_styling()
```
